TopicTitle: [video] I docked a craft, with another craft - whilst hovering on the Mun!

Articles.Content:
Two minutes long - you can bail after the dock. Has anyone even tried this?

This is the icing on my Mun base

2 things:

1. awesome

2. jeb just got his insurance cancelled for video documented proof of him being a liability to the insurance company <when he bailed from a lit rocket lol>
Nice. I did that on a rescue mission once, when I realized I didn't have enough fuel to make orbit on my lander. So I landed a probe controlled fuel tank with a docking port right on top.

2 things:

1. awesome

2. jeb just got his insurance cancelled for video documented proof of him being a liability to the insurance company <when he bailed from a lit rocket lol>

Thanks for the rep.

Jeb will dispute the claim with the insurance company. He'll claim that he put the rocket in a perfectly circular orbit and he did a jetpack back to space to catch that rocket and return it safely to Kerbin. And since Jeb is Jeb - who could possibly dispute that. 8-)
